title: report abuse
content: I've been getting messages labeled Moxilla Firefox that tell me to "click here to fix the error now" or "turn on your virus defender" for issues like virus attack, trojan virus, critical alert, etc. Is this a scam or do i need to click? I've been clicking on "Dismiss" to make them go away but they keep coming back. Getting 50-100 a day.
creator: shodorow

title: Lost folders in Thunderbird
content:
Hello!

A very important email folder in my Thunderbird just vanished. I didn't touch anything! My email was downloading very slowly and so I closed the entire Thunderbird application. When I re-opened it, the folder was gone. Everything else is there as before - all other folders, my inbox etc.

I have no idea what happened or where the folder went. I can't find anything online that addresses the problem or how to solve it. I'm very much a tech novice. I need a solution that a 5 year old could navigate lol

S.O.S. Cara
creator: a.sabinal

title: I don't like using anything Google.
content: I like using google because they are pretty much the only option I have for a lot of things because I mainly use my phone, but I just have a strange feeling that they are always listening and I'm not getting certain searches or the most out of my phone that I can with just there stand alone, apps and when I try to download or install certain apps or use certain things. It just always seemed to have a problem with so i'm trying to go around google, but yet still use google if you know what I mean.
creator: asoldiersshine
